name: Lost (itch) (Merijn)
description:
You are a space engineer, assigned to take care of dinner. While picking vegetables from the garden you slip and fall...

Free falling through space, you are confronted with the enormity of space.

In blind panic you see the space station getting smaller and smaller.
Will there still be a way to get home in time for dinner?

With:

- Planets from Pudman: http://opengameart.org/content/2d-space-shooter-as...

- Rocket from J.M. Atencia: http://opengameart.org/content/2d-space-shooter-as...

- Music from yd: http://opengameart.org/content/spacelife-14
